text: Mattias Ekström, Reinis Nitišs and Petter Solberg Ramona Karlsson Anton Marklund (airborne), Daniel Holten and Jean-Baptiste Dubourg (background) Fans of Andreas Bakkerud Toomas Heikkinen The start of the final Timmy Hansen takes the lead from Ekström at the final corner. He was judged to have cut the corner and was subsequently penalised The 2015 World RX of Sweden was the sixth round of the second season of the FIA World Rallycross Championship. The event was held at the Höljesbanan in Höljes, Värmland. ==Heats== {| class=wikitable style="font-size:95%" ! ! ! Driver ! Team ! Car ! ! ! ! !
